price: 92. Obéissez à Allah, obéissez au Messager et soyez sur vos gardes ! Mais si vous vous rétractez par la suite, sachez qu’il n’appartient à Notre Messager que de transmettre clairement le Message.
arabic: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَٱحۡذَرُواْۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla wa-iḥ'dharū fa-in tawallaytum fa-iʿ'lamū annamā ʿalā rasūlinā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
